Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two students using a string telephone to communicate.
The student can depict the string connecting two cups (or another device) to show sound travel.
The student can show that the device (string telephone) is being used to send or receive messages over a distance.
The student can represent how the string telephone uses sound to communicate information.
The student can emphasize the importance of using materials like cups and string, highlighting the connection between science, technology, and solving communication problems.
The student can include annotations or labels explaining how the string telephone works based on scientific concepts of sound travel.
